DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of an online intervention in increasing condom use among HIV+ gay males.
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Trial of an Individualized Web-Based Condom Use Intervention
DOC.criteria: 1. are HIVseropositive, 2. Men who are having sex with men, 3. engaging in unprotected anal intercourse with a partner who is serostatus negative or unknown 4. age 18 years and older, 5. ability to read English 6. have access to a computer and internet.
